CustomField.formula: IF(MONTH( TODAY()) =12, 11, IF(MONTH( TODAY()) = 1, 12, IF(MONTH( TODAY()) = 2, 1, IF(MONTH( TODAY()) = 3, 2, IF(MONTH( TODAY()) = 4, 3, IF(MONTH( TODAY()) = 5, 4, IF(MONTH( TODAY()) = 6, 5, IF(MONTH( TODAY()) = 7, 6, IF(MONTH( TODAY()) = 8, 7, IF(MONTH( TODAY()) = 9, 8, IF(MONTH( TODAY()) = 10, 9, IF(MONTH( TODAY()) = 11, 10, 0))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Month - Last Month
